volumeId.description: The volume to retrieve annotations for.

layerId.description: The ID for the layer to get the annotations.

annotationId.description: The ID of the volume annotation to retrieve.

locale.description: The locale information for the data. ISO-639-1 language and ISO-3166-1 country code. Ex: 'en_US'.

source.description: String to identify the originator of this request.

fields.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

key.description: API key. Your API key identifies your project and provides you with API access, quota, and reports. Required unless you provide an OAuth 2.0 token.

oauth_token.description: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

prettyPrint.description: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

quotaUser.description: Available to use for quota purposes for server-side applications. Can be any arbitrary string assigned to a user, but should not exceed 40 characters.

$ul: **annotationDataId**: The annotation data id for this volume annotation.
**annotationDataLink**: Link to get data for this annotation.
**annotationType**: The type of annotation this is.
**contentRanges**: The content ranges to identify the selected text.
**cfiRange**
**endOffset**: The offset from the ending position.
**endPosition**: The ending position for the range.
**startOffset**: The offset from the starting position.
**startPosition**: The starting position for the range.
**contentVersion**: Content version applicable to ranges below.
**gbImageRange**
**endOffset**: The offset from the ending position.
**endPosition**: The ending position for the range.
**startOffset**: The offset from the starting position.
**startPosition**: The starting position for the range.
**gbTextRange**
**endOffset**: The offset from the ending position.
**endPosition**: The ending position for the range.
**startOffset**: The offset from the starting position.
**startPosition**: The starting position for the range.
**data**: Data for this annotation.
**deleted**: Indicates that this annotation is deleted.
**id**: Unique id of this volume annotation.
**kind**: Resource Type
**layerId**: The Layer this annotation is for.
**pageIds**: Pages the annotation spans.
**selectedText**: Excerpt from the volume.
**selfLink**: URL to this resource.
**updated**: Timestamp for the last time this anntoation was updated. (RFC 3339 UTC date-time format).
**volumeId**: The Volume this annotation is for.
